DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To analyze expression ROR1 surface primary neuroblastoma cell . - To investigate therapeutic potential anti-ROR1 monoclonal antibody ( mAbs ) , bispecific antibody , immunotoxins vitro vivo model neuroblastoma . OUTLINE : Archived bone marrow tumor tissue sample analyze ROR1 expression flow cytometry , western blotting , qPCR , IHC .
